## ValidateOptions.ignoreJsonIncompatibleTypes property

Ignore JSON-incompatible types, such as ArrayBuffer, Date, CustomTypes...

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ignoreJsonIncompatibleTypes?: boolean;
```
